tabs.tab_content:
• Aramid high tenacity FR thread
  • Bar-tacked at all stress points
  • 3 snap closure at CF
  • 2 chest tabs for radio mic or gas monitor, 4.5″ down from the top of the shoulder seam

• 2 large lower flap pockets with velcro closure
  • 2 upper pockets, left one for radio

Protective flame retardant and arc flash suits described in this technical standard are used in noxious and hazardous environments must meet the following safety and visibility standards:

  • CAT2
  • ATPV 9.2 cal/cm2 (electric arc flash rating)
  • NFPA 1975,NFPA 70E,ASTM F1506, CAN/CGSB 155.20,CAN/CGSB 155.22, OSHA 29 CFR1910.269, EN ISO11611,EN ISO11612,EN ISO14116,EN ISO13036
  • UL certified NFPA2112
  • OEKO-TEX Standard 100
